about_the_game:
Don't drop your cargo!

Your job is a simple task to load the falling cargo well so that it does not fall off the back of the truck.

Some of the packages may be a little unusual, such as bear figurines or lampposts, but don't worry about the details.

- Rules - 1.
1. Do not drop the load from the back of the truck.
2. You must load the truck until it is fully loaded.
3. After the truck leaves, the load must not fall off before reaching the goal.

- Difficulty Level -
Levels increase every 500 pts. up to a maximum of level 7.
The difficulty level increases with each level.

- Flow of the game -.
1. The falling luggage is randomly selected.
2. The luggage is loaded onto the truck bed while adjusting the position and angle of the luggage.
3. When the truck is fully loaded, the truck will automatically head for the goal.
4. The next truck arrives and the game returns to 1.

- Game Clear - There is no clear in this game.
There is no clear in this game. There is no way to clear the game.

- Controls - Use WASD keys to move the truck.
WASD keys to move the load.
IJKL key to rotate luggage
Enter key to drop the baggage
C key to cancel a load*, but points will be deducted.


This game can be distributed on video distribution sites by both individuals and corporations. You may also monetize the game.
